feed.title: Double Take Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Double Take: v1.13.11.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Apply fixes from CodeFactor by @skrashevich in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/106
  • build(deps): bump docker/metadata-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/116
  • build(deps): bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/115
  • build(deps): bump luxon from 2.5.2 to 3.4.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/111
  • Apply fixes from CodeFactor by @skrashevich in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/120
  • build(deps): bump docker/build-push-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/114
  • build(deps): bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/113
  • build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/104
  • Update mqtt.util.js to correct spelling in verbose log message by @leccelecce in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/122
  • build(deps): bump archiver from 5.3.2 to 6.0.1 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/105
  • build(deps): bump docker/login-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/123
  • build(deps): bump ace-linters from 0.12.1 to 0.13.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/87
  • build(deps): bump luxon from 2.5.2 to 3.4.3 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/110
  • Documentation: README for docker on windows by @skrashevich in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/128
  • build(deps): bump codacy/codacy-analysis-cli-action from 1.1.0 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/133
  • build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/132

New Contributors

  • @leccelecce made their first contribution in https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/pull/122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/compare/v1.13.11.3...v1.13.11.4

entry.title: New release for Double Take: v1.13.11.5
entry.content:
Bug Fixes

  • [BUG] fix error "Cannot set headers after they are sent to the client"

Others

  • Migrate to NodeJS 18
  • Logs button in top menu bar

Full Changelog: https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/compare/v1.13.11.4...v1.13.11.5

entry.title: New release for Double Take: v1.13.11.6.1
entry.content:
1.13.11.6.1

Bug Fixes

  • [BUG] fix top menu

1.13.11.6

Changes

  • [BUG/Feature] added ability to disable ip checks in double-take hassio addon

Full Changelog: https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/compare/v1.13.11.5...v1.13.11.6.1

entry.title: New release for Double Take: v1.13.11.7
entry.content:
1. Reintroduces support for the arm/v7 architecture
  2. Removes unused code. Reduce docker container size
  3. Performance optimizations have been implemented for better efficiency
  4. Option to trace SQL queries has been added for better debugging and tracking.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/skrashevich/double-take/compare/v1.13.11.6.1...v1.13.11.7

entry.title: New release for Double Take: v1.13.11.8
entry.content:
